drive

Class Drive

  • java.lang.Object
    • drive.Drive

  • public class Drive
extends java.lang.Object
    Drive code for basic tank drive system using one controller with two joysticks
    Author:
    Trevor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Drive.DriveControlStates
      Enums that account for all control states for the drive system

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DriveConfigDefault config 
      private Drive.DriveControlStates driveControlState
      Holds the control state that the drive system is currently in
      private MyJoystick joy 
      private double left
      Used for setting left and right side motors when in the OPEN_LOOP_SET mode
      private MotionProfileFollower leftFollower
      Object used to follow a motion profile for the left side
      protected com.ctre.CANTalon[] leftTalons
      Array containing all talons on the left side of the drivebase.
      private Loop loop
      Main control loop, run at periodically from the Looper class
      private double right
      Used for setting left and right side motors when in the OPEN_LOOP_SET mode
      private MotionProfileFollower rightFollower
      Object used to follow a motion profile for the right side
      protected com.ctre.CANTalon[] rightTalons
      Array containing all talons on the right side of the drivebase.

    • Field Detail

      • config

        protected DriveConfigDefault config

      • leftTalons

        protected com.ctre.CANTalon[] leftTalons
        Array containing all talons on the left side of the drivebase. First element is the master talon, all following are slaves

      • rightTalons

        protected com.ctre.CANTalon[] rightTalons
        Array containing all talons on the right side of the drivebase. First element is the master talon, all following are slaves

      • leftFollower

        private MotionProfileFollower leftFollower
        Object used to follow a motion profile for the left side

      • rightFollower

        private MotionProfileFollower rightFollower
        Object used to follow a motion profile for the right side

      • joy

        private MyJoystick joy

      • left

        private double left
        Used for setting left and right side motors when in the OPEN_LOOP_SET mode

      • right

        private double right
        Used for setting left and right side motors when in the OPEN_LOOP_SET mode

      • driveControlState

        private Drive.DriveControlStates driveControlState
        Holds the control state that the drive system is currently in

      • loop

        private final Loop loop
        Main control loop, run at periodically from the Looper class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drive

        public Drive(DriveConfigDefault config,
             MyJoystick joy)
        Initializes the drive subsystem by setting talons, sensors, pid values, and slaves
        Parameters:
        config - Config that holds all values, either default or user set, to use
        joy - Joystick object that represents physical joystick to use for driving

    • Method Detail

      • getLoop

        public Loop getLoop()
        Use for starting loop through Looper class
        Returns:
        main control loop

      • move

        public void move(double[] rTheta)
        Sets left and right drivebase wheels based off of polar coordinates
        Parameters:
        rTheta - 2 element array that contains a magnitude on a scale of -1 to 1 and a heading in radians

      • move

        public void move(double r,
                 double theta)
        Sets left and right drivebase wheels based off of polar coordinates
        Parameters:
        r - magnitude on a scale of -1 to 1
        theta - heading in radians

      • ramp

        public void ramp(double wantSpeedLeft,
                 double wantSpeedRight)
        Ramps the speed of the left and right wheels if needed
        Parameters:
        wantSpeedLeft - The wanted speed for the left side
        wantSpeedRight - The wanted speed for the right side

      • getSetValue

        public int getSetValue()
        Gets the set value to set the talon to when it is in motion profile mode
        Returns:
        Set value where 0 - Disable, 1 - Enable, and 2 - Hold

      • motionProfileMode

        public void motionProfileMode()
        Sets the talons to a mode where they can follow a motion profile

      • openLoopJoyMode

        public void openLoopJoyMode()
        Sets the talons to a mode where they can be controlled by the joystick

      • openLoopSetMode

        public void openLoopSetMode(double left,
                            double right)
        Sets the talons to a mode where they can be given a left and a right speed
        Parameters:
        left - Speed for left side on a scale of -1 to 1
        right - Speed for right side on a scale of -1 to 1

      • resetToOpenLoop

        private void resetToOpenLoop()
        Resets the talons so that they're buffer is clear and they can accept PercentVbus commands (-1 to 1)

      • startMotionProfile

        public void startMotionProfile()
        Starts the motion profile for the loaded paths

      • setPaths

        public void setPaths(double[][] left,
                     double[][] right)
        Load two paths to be run as a motion profile
        Parameters:
        left - left path as a 2d array such that the first dimension is an array of points, and each point is laid out as such {accumulated position, velocity, dt} where accumulated position is in rotations, velocity is in rpm, and dt is in ms
        right - right path as a 2d array such that the first dimension is an array of points, and each point is laid out as such {accumulated position, velocity, dt} where accumulated position is in rotations, velocity is in rpm, and dt is in ms
